course.subject: SOSC
course.name: Introduction to Hong Kong
course.description: This short one-credit course, intended for students participating in the UST-UVa Jefferson Global Seminar, provides an overview of the history, economics, politics, and society of Hong Kong. Particular attention will be given to the issues of political structure, Hong Kong-mainland relations, and socio-economic policy that lay behind the recent "Umbrella" movement. Graded P or F.
